attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I wish the Governement NOT CLOSE the contra flow to the Black Wall Tunnel, which is due to close on 20/4/07.It is conceded closing it will result in severe congestion to all drivers for the future. TFL and Police quote health and safety and bad drivers who over take resulting in accidents,but the Police already have the cameras to monitor and collect evidence and the power to penalise offenders who drive recklessly, even if they are visitors to the country. Clearly by closing the contra flow this is merely another way of ensuring severe congestion and will culminate in the introduction of a stealth tax in the form of congestion charging. 
Enough is enough,  open the contra flow and penalise the bad drivers not the honest hard working drivers that need to get to and from work, as these will be the only persons penalised by closing the contra flow and any introduction of a congestion charge, that i am sure would shortly follow to alleviate that conveniently engineered congestion.

rejection.details: Please re-submit with a proper title for your petition, not your name, and without all the CAPITALS, as they make it hard for people to read
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
